snippet: RATNER--Laura. Our hearts are saddened by the death of Laura, mother of our very dear friends Felice (Jay) and Dennis (Andrea). She lived a long life and is now at peace. We will miss her. Cheryl and Bill 1/3
lead_paragraph: RATNER--Laura. Our hearts are saddened by the death of Laura, mother of our very dear friends Felice (Jay) and Dennis (Andrea). She lived a long life and is now at peace. We will miss her. Cheryl and Bill 1/3
